text: 🇳🇱 Recycling is a commendable practice for our planet. Maar let op: overheveling verantwoordelijkheid van onze afvalbehandeling naar de overheid is geen oplossing. 🚫Instead, let's encourage individual responsibility and promote free-market solutions. 💡For instance, incentives for businesses to innovate in recycling technology and consumers to make eco-friendly choices. 🌍Together, we can reduce waste and protect our environment without sacrificing personal freedoms or fiscal responsibility. 💪🏼
